metadata.name: Loft Module (Portable House)
metadata.description:
Loft Module is an avant-garde and flexible portable houseâ€”the first for the metaverse and the real world. Inspired by a yacht or hotel suite, its contemporary, flexible and elegant design make this "NFTiny house" an unique work of art.

"With large windows, flexibility and interior clarity, the Loft Module is perfect to connect with nature and enjoy distant views. Its versatile space with an integrated kitchen, transparent bathroom and materials such as glass, aluminum, wood and vinyl, create an experience of luxury, comfort and avant-garde"
